projects.name: Markdown Editor
projects.description: I like this project a lot. It's simple, but also had taught me a lot about different ways of parsing and transoforming texts.

projects.name: POD Landing page
projects.description: This is one of the first landing pages I've done. The main thing I've learnt from it - was regex and testing/comparing text to a pattern.

projects.name: Todo App
projects.description: There's no way this list would be complete without Todo App, so here you go. With this project I've learn a lot about rendering lists. Great experience.

projects.name: Crowdfunding LP
projects.description: This landing page is awesome! A lot of animations, trasitions, modal windows. Feels like a real deal. It has some things I'd like to make better or add. But overall it's pretty solid

projects.name: Splitter Tip
projects.description: Everyone does regular calculators when learning JS. I've decided to make it a little more interesting, so now you have a calculator for tips.

projects.name: Comfy Online Store
projects.description: Great project. I've learn a lot about routing, architecture and data manipulation. Main goal was to create an online-store-like functioning project.
